<template>
  <basic-block
    :block-width="'23%'"
    :side-color="'rgb(53,143,18)'"
  >
  <slot></slot>
  </basic-block>
</template>

<script>
export default {

}
</script>

<style scoped>
  basic-block:hover{
    display: flex;
    width: 100%;
    height: 98%;
    background-color: rgb(45,82,35);
    box-sizing: border-box;
    justify-content: center; 
    align-items: center;
    border-radius: 0.5rem;
    transform: translateY(-5px); 
    box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
  }

</style>
